kernel_string.c

00019 #include "kernel_string.h"
00020 #include "kernel_error.h"
00021 #include <ctype.h>
00022 #include <stdarg.h>
00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 #include <string.h>
00025 
00026 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00027 namespace ipl{ /* use namespace if C++ */
00028 extern "C" { /* prevent name mangling for C functions */
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 void k_InitString(TString* pString)
00032 {
00033         pString->pChars=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char));
00034         pString->pChars[0]='\0';
00035         pString->NumberOfChars=0;
00036         pString->AllocatedChars=1; /* internal use */
00037 }
00038 
00039 /*      Deletes all allocated memory for the string */
00040 void k_EmptyString(TString* pString)
00041 {
00042         if (pString->pChars!=NULL)
00043         {
00044                 free(pString->pChars);
00045                 pString->pChars=NULL;
00046         }
00047         pString->NumberOfChars=0;
00048         pString->AllocatedChars=0; /* internal use */
00049 }
00050 
00051 void k_DeleteString(TString* pString)
00052 {
00053         if (pString->pChars!=NULL)
00054                 free(pString->pChars);
00055         k_InitString(pString);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void k_AllocString(TString* pString,unsigned int InitialSize)
00059 {
00060         k_EmptyString(pString);
00061         if (InitialSize==0)
00062                 InitialSize=1; /* minimum one allocated char */
00063         InitialSize++; /* allocate space for the ending '\0' character */
00064         pString->pChars=(char*)malloc(InitialSize*sizeof(char));
00065         pString->pChars[0]='\0'; /* start with an empty string */
00066         pString->NumberOfChars=0; /* just in case! */
00067         pString->AllocatedChars=InitialSize; /* internal use */
00068 }
00069 
00070 void k_ReAllocString(TString* pString,unsigned int NewSize)
00071 {
00072         if (pString->pChars==NULL)
00073                 k_InitString(pString);
00074 
00075         if ((pString->pChars=(char*)realloc(pString->pChars,(++NewSize)*sizeof(char)))!=NULL)
00076         {
00077                 pString->AllocatedChars=NewSize; /* internal use */
00078         }
00079         else
00080         {
00081                 TString str;
00082                 k_InitString(&str);
00083                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00084                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_ReAllocString() Realloc failed");
00085             k_EmptyString(&str);
00086         }
00087 }
00088 
00089 void k_AdjustSizeOfString(TString* pString)
00090 {
00091         pString->pChars=(char*)realloc(pString->pChars,pString->NumberOfChars*sizeof(char));
00092         pString->AllocatedChars=pString->NumberOfChars;
00093 }
00094 
00095 void k_AddCharToString(char Character,TString* pString)
00096 {
00097         if (pString->pChars==NULL)
00098                 k_InitString(pString);
00099 
00100         if (pString->NumberOfChars==(pString->AllocatedChars-1))
00101                 /* the -1 to take into account the allocated '\0' character */
00102         {
00103                 /* allocate 2 times previous allocated memory or 2 if memory never allocated before */
00104                 pString->AllocatedChars = 
00105                         (pString->AllocatedChars==1) ? 2 : 2*(pString->AllocatedChars-1);
00106 
00107                 k_ReAllocString(pString,pString->AllocatedChars);
00108         }
00109         /* insert character and increment total characters variable */
00110         pString->pChars[pString->NumberOfChars] = Character;
00111         pString->pChars[pString->NumberOfChars+1] = '\0';
00112         pString->NumberOfChars++;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void k_AddCharArrayToString(const char* pCharArray,TString* pString)
00116 {
00117         unsigned int length=strlen(pCharArray);
00118         if (pString->pChars==NULL)
00119                 k_InitString(pString);
00120 
00121         if ((pString->NumberOfChars+length)>=(pString->AllocatedChars-1))
00122                 /* the -1 to take into account the allocated '\0' character */
00123         {
00124                 /* allocate 2 times previous allocated memory or 2*"length" if allocated memory 
00125                         is less than "length" */
00126                 pString->AllocatedChars = 
00127                         (pString->AllocatedChars<=length) ? (2*length) : 2*(pString->AllocatedChars-1);
00128 
00129                 k_ReAllocString(pString,pString->AllocatedChars);
00130         }
00131         /* copy given string (pCharArray) to pString and increment total characters variable */
00132         memcpy(&pString->pChars[pString->NumberOfChars],pCharArray,length);
00133         pString->NumberOfChars+=length;
00134         pString->pChars[pString->NumberOfChars] = '\0';
00135 }
00136 
00137 void k_SprintfString(TString* pString,char* fmt, ...)
00138 {
00139         const unsigned int MAX_STRING_SIZE=200;
00140         char* p;
00141         va_list args; /* argument pointer */
00142         p=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*MAX_STRING_SIZE);
00143 
00144         va_start(args,fmt);
00145         if ((unsigned int)vsprintf(p,fmt,args)>=MAX_STRING_SIZE)
00146         {
00147                 TString str;
00148                 k_InitString(&str);
00149                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00150                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_SprintfString() array contained in the parameter fmt too long");
00151                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00152                 return;
00153         }
00154         else
00155         {
00156                 k_AddCharArrayToString(p,pString);
00157         }
00158         va_end(args);
00159         free(p);
00160 }
00161 
00162 bool k_InsertCharInString(char Character, unsigned int Index, TString* pString)
00163 {
00164         if (Index>=pString->NumberOfChars)
00165         {
00166                 TString str;
00167                 k_InitString(&str);
00168                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00169                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_InsertCharInString() Index (%d) is out of range (NumberOfChars=%d)",
00170                         Index,pString->NumberOfChars);
00171             k_EmptyString(&str);
00172                 return false;
00173         }
00174         if (pString->pChars==NULL)
00175                 k_InitString(pString);
00176 
00177         /* Add a dummy position to the end of position array */
00178         k_AddCharToString(pString->pChars[0],pString);
00179         /* Move positions */
00180         memmove(&(pString->pChars[Index+1]),&(pString->pChars[Index]),
00181                 sizeof(char)*(pString->NumberOfChars-Index-1));
00182         /* Store the new position at Index */
00183         pString->pChars[Index]=Character;
00184         return true;
00185 }
00186 
00187 bool k_RemoveCharFromString(unsigned int Index, TString* pString)
00188 {
00189         if (Index>=pString->NumberOfChars)
00190         {
00191                 TString str;
00192                 k_InitString(&str);
00193                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00194                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_RemoveCharFromString() Index (%d) is out of range (NumberOfChars=%d)",
00195                         Index,pString->NumberOfChars);
00196             k_EmptyString(&str);
00197                 return false;
00198         }
00199         if (pString->pChars==NULL)
00200                 k_InitString(pString);
00201 
00202         /* If the Index is the last position in character array no movement */
00203         if (Index<(pString->NumberOfChars-1))
00204         {
00205                 /* Move positions */
00206                 memmove(&(pString->pChars[Index]),&(pString->pChars[Index+1]),
00207                         sizeof(char)*(pString->NumberOfChars-Index));
00208         }
00209         else
00210         {
00211                 pString->pChars[pString->NumberOfChars-1]='\0';
00212         }
00213         pString->NumberOfChars--;
00214         return true;
00215 }
00216 
00217 void k_CopyString(TString* pDest, const TString* pSource)
00218 {
00219         k_EmptyString(pDest);
00220         pDest->NumberOfChars=pSource->NumberOfChars;
00221         pDest->AllocatedChars=pSource->AllocatedChars;
00222         /* allocate memory for characters and copy characters */
00223         pDest->pChars=(char*) malloc(pSource->AllocatedChars*sizeof(char));
00224         memcpy(pDest->pChars,pSource->pChars,(pSource->NumberOfChars+1)*sizeof(char));
00225 }
00226 
00227 char* k_FindInString(const char* pStr, const TString* pSource)
00228 {
00229         return strstr(pSource->pChars,pStr);
00230 }
00231 
00232 /* Convert string to uppercase */
00233 void k_StringToUpper(char* str)
00234 {
00235         char *c=str;
00236         while(*c!='\0')
00237         {
00238                 *c=(char)toupper(*c);
00239                 c++;
00240         }
00241 }
00242 
00243 void k_ConvertCharacters(char* str,char SearchChar, char ReplaceChar)
00244 {
00245         char *c=str;
00246         while(*c!='\0')
00247         {
00248                 if (*c==SearchChar)
00249                 {
00250                         *c=ReplaceChar;
00251                 }
00252                 c++;
00253         }
00254 }

00258 } /* end namespace ipl */
